entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
